column1: Agnibilékrou is a town in eastern Ivory Coast. It is a sub-prefecture of and seat of Agnibilékrou Department in Indénié-Djuablin Region
column2: Comoé District. Agnibilékrou is also a commune.
the population of the sub-prefecture of Agnibilékrou was 69
